description: "Taken from Benedetto Bordone's ‘Isolario [The Book of Islands]’, these pages contain two maps: one of Sumatra (‘Iaua Minore’), and one of a group of five unknown islands (Locaz is thought to possibly be Thailand)."
title: "[Iava minore and map of Necumera, Locaz, Patera, Botegon Mangama]"
